item.description:
Check Out Our Spiritual Journey Within
Introduction Video Now & Then Join Us For Our Live Online Guided Meditation Monday April 8th Followed By Q&A

Spiritual Journey Within Our Foundation Course
Enjoy Our Video Introduction with William & Judith of Pathways To Health NY By Visiting Our Link Below
http://pathwaystohealth.com/our-foundation-course-spiritual-journey-within/

Don't Miss Our Live Online Guided
Meditation Followed by Q & A With William & Judith
April 8th 2013 @ 9pm EST Follow instructions Below!!!

Share This Information & Video Link with
Family & Friends
You can even post it on FACEBOOK!
Then This Coming Monday April 8th @ 9pm
Join Us For Our Live Conference Call
By Using Your Telephone.
Dial +1 (619) 550-0000
Enter Access Code: 245-922-773
For A Guided Meditation
By William & Judith.
They Will Also Be Available
After Meditation For Questions!

You Can Also Join Us Live By Using GoToMeeting.com
Watch While Listening To William & Judith
Simply Follow These Instructions Below
Please join our meeting,
April 8th at 9:00 PM EST.
By Clicking On Link Below At Scheduled Time
https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/245922773
Use your microphone & speakers (VoIP) From Your Computer or Phone.
A headset is recommended.
Meeting Password: journey
Meeting ID: 245-922-773
After Clicking To Join The Meeting,
You will see an Audio PIN to enter!
If you do not have a Microphone or speakers
You can still watch online & listen using your phone.
Dial +1 (619) 550-0000
Access Code: 245-922-773


Our Next Spiritual Journey Within
Will Be Held On
April 19th, 20th & 21st
Friday 7:30pm Saturday & Sunday 9am - 5pm
Don't Miss This Transformational Course
This 2 &1/2 day course will change your life.
It is designed to help you:
* Connect with your Higher Self
* Discover your deepest soul qualities
* Handle change in your life effectively
* Realize the power of thought
* Give and receive unconditional love
* Use inspirational writing
* Use energy to facilitate healing in yourself and others
* Live a more spiritual, awakened and fulfilling life.
No Prerequisite For This Class
$395
Spiritual Journey Within is a
Prerequisite for Intuitive & An-Ra
*If traveling from far,
Ask About Local Room & Board Packages
Call Now To Register
631-642-2200
item.name: Spiritual Journey Within Introduction Video & Live Online Guided Meditation
